repairedDockerfile:
FROM ruby:2.5.1

RUN apt-get update -qq && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y build-essential libpq-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN mkdir /sapp
WORKDIR /sapp

ADD Gemfile /sapp/Gemfile
ADD Gemfile.lock /sapp/Gemfile.lock

RUN bundle install

ADD . /sapp

CMD ["ruby", "service.rb", "-o", "0.0.0.0"]
